scripts.setup:
mkdir -p traefik/certs traefik/acme && mkcert -install && mkcert -key-file traefik/certs/traefik.key -cert-file traefik/certs/traefik.crt localhost *.$PROJECT_NAME.localhost && echo "tls:
  certificates:
    - name: mylocalcert
      certFile: /certs/traefik.crt
      keyFile: /certs/traefik.key" > traefik/tls.yml
